scripts.deploy:svenska:prod: cross-var cross-env PUBLIC_URL=https://svenska-dataviz.ylestatic.fi/$npm_package_name/ yarn run build && dataviz-deploy generate --dir dist && cross-var dataviz-deploy sync svenska $npm_package_name --folder dist && cross-var echo "https://svenska-dataviz.ylestatic.fi/$npm_package_name"
scripts.deploy:svenska:test: cross-var cross-env PUBLIC_URL=https://svenska-dataviz.test.ylestatic.fi/$npm_package_name/ yarn run build && dataviz-deploy generate --dir dist && cross-var dataviz-deploy sync svenska-test $npm_package_name --folder dist && cross-var echo "https://svenska-dataviz.test.ylestatic.fi/$npm_package_name"
